facts.title: an uncontrolled stress is the leading cause of anger.
pretending you don't have feeling like anger, sadness, or loneliness can mentally destroy you.

artists were limited in their colou option until recently
originally carrots weren't orange; the most common colour was purple.
blue is the king of all colours as it is the most visible amongst them. lt translates reliability and a sense of dependency to the people.
